Key Match Events: Jones allowed a pair of home runs and a season-high matching six earned runs in a 7-1 Pirates loss to the Reds
Post-Match Reflections: Jones confirmed that he is fine and there is no injury
Shelton said that Jones' stuff is still good, but they need to make sure it's more consistent
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jones recorded a 6.15 ERA (26 1/3 IP, 18 earned runs) in his five starts since returning from the injured list
Jones became just the seventh Pirate rookie to eclipse 125 strikeouts in a season
Others: The game was played in a muggy afternoon on the banks of the Ohio River
